channel.title: Win Minesweeper Expert in 1 Second Every time!

item.title: Win Minesweeper Expert in 1 Second Every time!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

This works, but it is pretty pointless. Why ruin the fun of the game? Minesweeper is all about getting the best time. And besides, everyone will know you cheated as the world record is like 37 seconds.

Read full topic
item.source: Win Minesweeper Expert in 1 Second Every time!

item.title: Win Minesweeper Expert in 1 Second Every time!
item.dc:creator: @remoladen remoladen
item.description:
@remoladen wrote:

This script wins Minesweeper on Expert in 1 second.
You must open Minesweeper, set it to expert (only works on expert) then run MS_SETUP, after running MS_SETUP, You can run MS. Just click new game, and click RUN in MS, and it should win in 1 second. NOTE: may not work if you have a slow computer, and may mess up if you move your mouse.
NOTE:Do not specify the minesweeper window, just click play

MS_SETUP (Run this first, when minesweeper is open)

[code]program New;
var
X,Y,X2,Y2,X4,Y4: Integer;
begin

FindColor( x, y, 15787753, 0, 0, 9999, 9999)
X2:=X+4
Y2:=Y+94
MoveMouse(X2,Y2);
GetMousePos(X4, Y4);
ClickMouse(X4,Y4,true);
SendKeysVB(‘xyzzy+{enter}’,True);
end.[/code]

MS (After running MS_SETUP, run this as many times as you want, and it should win every time)

[code]{
NOTE:FIRST RUN MS_SETUP or this will not work,
you must run the setup every time you open Minesweeper.
This Program Wins minesweeper on expert in 1 second.
Note: Only works for Windows XP, only works every other time,
May not work if your computer is slow, Only works on Expert!
Just open minesweeper, do not specify a window! Just click run!
If it stops working, quit out of minesweeper and try again.
If you move your mouse, it will mess up.
}
program New;
var
Color,color2, X, Y,X2,Y2,X3,Y3,X4,Y4,X5,Y5: Integer;
begin

FindColor( x, y, 15787753, 0, 0, 9999, 9999)
X5:=X+240
Y5:=Y+70
X2:=X+4
Y2:=Y+94
X3:=X2+419
Y3:=Y2+248
sleep(500);
MoveMouse(X2,Y2);
GetMousePos(X4, Y4);
ClickMouse(X4,Y4,true);
GetMousePos(X4, Y4);
ClickMouse(X4,Y4,true);
repeat
color2:=GetColor(X5,Y5);
if (color2=0)then
begin
ClickMouse(X5,Y5,true);
MoveMouse(X2,Y2);
GetMousePos(X4, Y4);
ClickMouse(X4,Y4,true);
end;
GetMousePos(X4, Y4);
MoveMouse(X4+16,Y4+1);

//sleep(50);

Color:=GetColor(0,0);
if (Color=16777215)then
begin
GetMousePos(X4, Y4);
ClickMouse(X4,Y4,true);
end else
begin
GetMousePos(X4, Y4);
ClickMouse(X4,Y4,false);

end;
GetMousePos(X4, Y4);
if (X4>X2+466)then
begin
GetMousePos(X4, Y4);
MoveMouse(X2-1,Y4);
GetMousePos(X4, Y4);
MoveMouse(X4,Y4+16);
end;
until(Y4>Y3);
end.[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Win Minesweeper Expert in 1 Second Every time!
